"I heard that Megatron," UM responded "and you shall follow my orders 
Motormaster, uless you want to be scrapped," he told him and pointed his 
large fusion cannon towards him.


>From: gestalt_menasor@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: My name is MEGATRON
>Date: Sun, 29 Apr 2001 21:59:30 -0000
>
>Megatron looks down from his position on the hill with a scowl. This
>changed his plans, but not to much. "Size has nothing to do with my
>POWER" he responded in a silent whisper of a voice, displaying his
>mood, as did his eyes as they began to shimmer red brightly.
>
>Motormaster stood up. "You will not lead me" he said defiantly.
>
>
